prompts: Create a snow-themed Pokemon with icy blue colors and a cute, round face.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a small creature hiding under a large ice cap.
Generate an adorable Ice-type Pokemon with a triangular shape and a playful personality.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in snowy mountains and has a playful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon with a unique ice shell and a cheerful expression.
Design a small, chubby Pokemon that loves to play in the snow.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like it could be a snowman with its ice features.
